description: This table contains the Arrival Therapies information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: ARR_THER_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The location at which the arrival therapy was performed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ARR_THER_LAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The laterality of the location.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right


Bilateral


N/A


Default

columns.name: ARR_THER_ITEM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID as to why arrival therapies were used. Arrival therapies are typically medications the patient is on when they arrive to the unit.  


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
